source.7f1748c4: ###### Task # 02: Computer Vision(OCR/ICR): Go to https://content.sbigeneral.in/uploads/e1904ff17d084f6582d5cc43bb6e059e.pdf, print the form, fill it (with fake details), scan and perform OCR. In nutshell, perform OCR on handwritten text using the above form as your base template. In this task, physically print the given form, fill it with handwritten data, and try to recognize what you filled.
